Faculty of Physics, University of Vienna, Austria :
Thesis: _[Experimental photonic quantum machine learning](https://github.com/dapingq/)_ 2017/10 -- 2020/03 : **M.Eng. in Electronic Engineering** :
Department of Electronic Science and Engineering, Graduate School of Engineering, Kyoto University, Japan :
Thesis: _[Broadband frequency entangled photon generation using silicon nitride ring cavities](https://github.com/dapingq/master-thesis/blob/master/main.pdf)_ 2013/09 -- 2017/06 : **B.Sc. in Physics** :
Department of Physics, School of Physics, Nanjing University, China RESEARCH EXPERIENCE =================================================== 2021/01 -- Present : **Photonic quantum machine learning** :
with [Prof. Philip Walther](https://walther.univie.ac.at/), University of Vienna, Austria : - designed, simulated, and experimentally demonstrated quantum machine learning protocols using linear optical systems : - developed and implemented full-stack quantum algorithms on integrated photonic circuits : - contributed to the development of a quantum optical satellite payload, now operational in orbit ([press release](https://rudolphina.univie.ac.at/en/quantum-computer-from-vienna-for-outer-space)) 2017/10 -- 2020/03 : **Quantum information processing** :
with [Prof. Shigeki Takeuchi](http://qip.kuee.kyoto-u.ac.jp/), Kyoto University, Japan :
also collaborated with [Prof. Shiyoshi Yokoyama](https://yokoyama-labo.cm.kyushu-u.ac.jp/) at Kyushu University : - extensive cleanroom fabrication of silicon and silicon nitride ring cavities : - generation, characterization, and manipulation of broadband, high-brightness frequency-entangled photon pairs 2015/09 -- 2020/06 : **Integrated quantum photonics** :
with [Prof. Xiaosong Ma](https://qoqi.nju.edu.cn/), Nanjing University, China OTHER EXPERIENCE =================================================== 2023/09 -- 2023/10 : **Ph.D. secondment** :
hosted by Prof. Ian Walmsley and Dr. Raj Patel, Imperial College London, UK :
working on new architecture of universal optical circuits 2021/05 -- 2021/11 : **Pixel characterization engineer** :
SmartSens Technology, Shanghai, China :
Evaluation and simulation of contact image sensor chips based on foundry processes AWARDS =================================================== 2021/03 -- 2024/02 : **Marie Sk≈Çodowska-Curie Action Early-Stage Researcher** :
